text: Priyam Priyamkaram is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Devidasan Chelanat, starring Saji Soman and Dhanya Menon in the lead role. ==Cast== * Saji Soman * Dhanya Menon * Manuraj * Jagathi Sreekumar * Sukumari * Devan * Reena * Remadevi * Aghastyan * Kalpana * Indrans * Sphadikam Jeorge * Vimal Raj ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Priyam Priyamkaram
